content.rendered:
Does your workplace
design work for you?

  • >

    Transform your workplace through design

  • >

    Fuel creativity and results through design

  • >

    30% quicker than conventional office fit-outs
Get In Touch
Creating inspiring offices

We create office interiors that work for today’s new world of work. Flexible, contemporary spaces that fuel creativity, promote positivity, boost productivity, and business results. Designed with you, your people and your brand at the forefront.

Book a free consultation
0 +
years in business,
and still growing
0 %
of our business in 2021
was from repeat clients
0 %
of our sales in 2022
were from referrals
0 %
quicker project
turnaround times

Workplace transformation
made easy

We’ve been delivering the highest quality office interiors in New York and New Jersey for over 30 years. Our innovative approach saves up to 30% time compared to traditional design and build methods.

Experience the RI Workplace difference today

Get in touch

Our unique four-step methodology sets us apart and supports our clients’ businesses to thrive.

Dream.

We’re here to advise you from the earliest stages - meeting with key personnel to understand your business, vision, goals, schedule and budget.

Design.

We work to your vision and use our own data to develop your customized solution. Our process takes up to 30% less time than the conventional design and build-out process.

Build.

Detailed planning, progressive budgeting and excellent communication guides the project - and your assigned RI project manager will be with you every step of the way.

Transform.

The benefits of your new design will be clear from the outset. From improved employee positivity and performance to the ease of attracting and retaining top talent, your new workplace will be a space set up for long-term success.

Here’s what our customers say…

“The entire team at RI Workplace was a sincere pleasure to work with and how the place turned out speaks for itself……Thank you! You were very easy to work with and everything came out exactly as we had planned.”
-President, Confidential Client, Red Bank, NJ
“Other vendors gave us all or nothing pricing, but RI Workplace gave us options to fit our budget. They were right on top of any issues and left everything nicely clean and buttoned up. They paid close attention to any details, were flexible, easy to communicate with and did outstanding work.”
-CEO, Austin Williams, Hauppauge, NY
“Working closely with you on this project was a blast. As you can imagine, it meant a great deal to me that we were successful in this endeavor.”
-Office Manager, KDLM, New York, NY
“Very happy with the project delivery and finished product. The team here loves it and it has elevated the whole culture here. RI Workplace’s team was excellent to work with!”
-CEO, PowerPak Civil & Safety, Congers, NY
“I would strongly recommend speaking with RI Workplace if you are considering any kind of office design! We have been thrilled with what your team did for us last year. Keep up the great work!”
-President & CEO, Coulmed, Springfield, NJ
“RI did an amazing job transforming our new space into a collaboration hub for our employees to host meetings, gather for lunch and catch up over coffee and snacks!”
-Director, HR, Corporate Essentials, Parsippany, NJ
“Super happy with the complete project. Thank you all. Our company’s space now matches the company. We spend more time at work than home. You have created a work environment that all our employees are very proud of.”
-Owner, ESTI Warehouse Inc., Cinnaminson, NJ
"RI has always been the first company we recommend and will continue to be. We are thrilled with our location.”
-President, Confidential Client, Red Bank, NJ
“All is great. Thank you again for all you guy’s have done for us.”
-President, ESTI Warehouse Inc., Cinnaminson, NJ
“When it comes to what you do best, better than others by far, RI is always our recommendation. You’re my first and only recommendation. You guys rock!”
-President, Austin Williams, Hauppauge, NY

Hybrid and flexible workspaces

Find out more

Let’s work together

Like to know how we can make the difference to your next workplace project?
